attributes.action: Change the emphasis and target  of Police Speed camera teams to Accident prevention on Motorways and Trunk Roads
attributes.additional_details:
I suggest that is now time to change slightly the emphasis  and targets  of Police Speed and Road safety  camera units.

Please consider campaigns on Motorways and trunk roads  to improve safety for vehicles  exiting  from  and entering motorways.  Too many  car drivers  suddenly veer from the middle lane  on to the exit lane at the very last minute.  Please install cameras  to  photograph those vehicles  which dangerously and recklessly  enter the exit slip road.
